name: Hyper Scuffle (itch)
description:
Hyper Scuffle is a decidedly bizarre 2D fighting game with fluid gameplay and a minimalist style. Each of its nine fighters is designed to be easy to understand, but complicated to master. Play against up to 4 players in local or online multiplayer!

Features:
  • nine fighters, each with their own unique abilities and play styles
  • a simple, vibrant art style inspired by early arcade games
  • interesting fighting mechanics not present in other games (such as screen wrapping and infinite player mobility)
  • three gamemodes: Classic, Contest, and Spectrum
  • XBox controller support
  • local, LAN, and online multiplayer
  • 15 subjectively gorgeous maps
  • AI for every fighter
  • more than 17 bugs and errors to discover
  • created by one guy over ~300 hours
  • costs over 50% less than a cup of coffee
  • could probably run on a potato
